Heroes vs Hackers - 2nd Place

Published on November 29, 2015.

Congos to all 3 winners in #heroesvshackers for super hacks @rajdeepdua @shashforce @kavindrapatel @SalesforceDevs pic.twitter.com/hlNUkmLmPh

— Naga Kiran Manyala (@SfdcKiran) November 29, 2015
Secured second place at heroes vs hackers at Bombay Stock Exchange. I worked on the entire frontend architecture of the web app. The idea was to make KYC integration with banks and adhaar account seamless and the entire customer interaction was recorded on SalesForce.
